title: Republic Day Portrait – Pride of India
prompt: Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY and ONLY facial identity reference. Preserve the face 100% unchanged. Create an authentic Republic Day poster in vertical 1080x1920 resolution. Place the subject in the upper-middle frame, standing confidently. Background features a soft Indian tricolor gradient with a glowing Ashoka Chakra behind the subject. Subtle India Gate silhouette at the bottom. Natural cinematic lighting, realistic skin tones, patriotic yet elegant mood, professional poster design.

title: Republic Day Patriotic Portrait
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the PRIMARY, ABSOLUTE, and ONLY facial identity reference. The subject’s face identity must remain 100% unchanged and perfectly preserved. Do NOT alter facial structure, proportions, symmetry, skin tone, skin texture, age, gender, jawline, cheekbones, nose, lips, eyes, eyebrows, forehead, hairline, facial hair, or any unique facial feature. Exact likeness is mandatory.

Generate an ultra-realistic cinematic patriotic portrait inspired by Indian Republic Day. The subject is holding or standing proudly beside the Indian national flag (Tiranga) with accurate saffron, white, green colors and a clearly visible Ashoka Chakra. The flag should appear naturally waving with realistic fabric folds and motion caused by wind.

Outfit: traditional or semi-traditional Indian attire such as white kurta, kurta-pyjama, or simple modern white clothing with a patriotic feel. Optional tricolor elements like dupatta, scarf, or subtle accessories are allowed but must look natural and respectful.

Pose & Emotion: confident, proud, calm, and respectful expression. The subject may look at the flag or slightly upward, symbolizing patriotism and unity. Natural hand grip on the flagpole if holding the flag.

Environment: outdoor setting such as terrace, open sky, monument background, rooftop, or open ground. Background should feel airy and celebratory with soft depth of field. Optional tricolor balloons or fabric decorations may appear subtly in the background.

Lighting: cinematic natural daylight or golden-hour lighting. Soft highlights on the face, realistic shadows, high dynamic range. Colors should feel vibrant but not oversaturated.

Camera & Framing: vertical 1080x1920 resolution. Frame the subject from head down to near the knees. If the uploaded image is cropped, half-body, or portrait-only, intelligently and realistically extend the body, clothing, hands, and background to achieve a natural near-knee composition with correct anatomy, perspective, and lighting.

Quality & Style: ultra-photorealistic, DSLR quality, sharp focus on face, realistic skin texture, cinematic color grading, patriotic mood, high detail, professional photography look. No blur, no distortion, no extra people, no text, no watermark, no logo.

title: Republic Day Resolve – The Spirit of the Constitution
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the ONLY and ABSOLUTE facial identity reference. The man’s face must remain 100% unchanged — same facial structure, skin tone, expression, beard, hair texture, and natural skin details. No beautification, no AI smoothing, no alteration of any kind.

Create a premium, ultra-realistic Republic Day poster-style cinematic portrait. The young Indian man stands confidently in the foreground, draped partially in the Indian national flag (Tiranga), holding it with dignity rather than motion. His posture is upright and resolute, symbolizing responsibility, unity, and constitutional pride. Facial expression is calm, confident, and determined — not emotional, not aggressive.

Background features an iconic Indian government-inspired setting — wide ceremonial pathway, subtle hints of Rashtrapati Bhavan or India Gate architecture blurred softly in the distance (not exact replicas, only inspired elements). The environment feels grand yet realistic, with early morning Republic Day atmosphere.

Lighting is soft winter morning sunlight (January feel), cool-neutral tones with gentle warmth on the face. Shadows are natural and balanced. Depth of field is shallow to medium, maintaining focus on the subject while preserving architectural depth.

Include elegant, realistic poster text integrated naturally into the image (not floating, not artificial):

Main text (top or center): "26 January – Republic Day of India"
Subtext (below): "Honouring the Constitution | Celebrating Unity"
Optional small footer text: "Justice • Liberty • Equality • Fraternity"

Text style must be premium, clean, and minimal — modern serif or official government-style typography, white or soft ivory color with subtle contrast. Text should feel professionally designed as part of a Republic Day poster, not over-styled.

Color grading is cinematic and mature — slightly muted tricolour tones, realistic skin color, cool greens and blues with controlled contrast. No oversaturation. Fabric texture of the flag must be clearly visible.

Camera style: professional DSLR, poster framing (mid-shot to near-knee), straight-on or slight low-angle for authority and pride. Ultra-high realism, photographic quality.

Overall mood: constitutional pride, unity, responsibility, strength, modern India — perfect for 26 January Republic Day poster visuals.

Resolution & format: vertical 1080x1920, ultra-high detail, poster-ready composition, no watermark, no logo, hyper-realistic cinematic photography style.

title: Balcony Cinematic Portrait with Sunglasses
prompt: Retro Hong Kong–style cinematic portrait with 100% accurate face matching. Use the uploaded image as the only facial identity reference; facial structure, skin tone, expression, and natural details must remain unchanged. A man leaning casually on a narrow apartment balcony railing, cute and thoughtful pose, head slightly tilted, calm and introspective expression. Messy Korean-style hair with soft natural volume and texture. Wearing black sunglasses with a matte finish. Outfit: oversized charcoal-grey shirt with relaxed drape, black tailored trousers, minimal accessories. Background: old Hong Kong apartment setting with weathered walls, metal railings, hanging laundry lines, urban density visible. Lighting: warm tungsten light mixed with subtle soft green ambient light, cinematic contrast. Visual style: analog film grain, cinematic bloom, soft highlights, shallow depth of field, sharp focus on face, natural skin glow. Color grading inspired by retro Hong Kong cinema, moody yet warm, premium cinematic aesthetic.

title: Man and Horse in Monochrome
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the primary visual reference for pose, framing, and subject placement. Preserve the overall composition and realism. Do not stylize or alter proportions unnaturally.

Create a cinematic black-and-white fashion portrait featuring a young man seated low on a simple metal stool in an open, barren field. His posture is introspective and grounded — elbows resting on his thighs, shoulders slightly hunched forward, head gently lowered as he looks down through dark rectangular sunglasses. Both hands loosely hold thin leather reins, resting naturally between his knees, suggesting quiet control rather than force.

He wears dark oversized winter layers — a heavy, padded coat with a relaxed silhouette, paired with wide-leg trousers and rugged leather boots. His hair is slightly tousled, adding softness to the otherwise strong, moody composition. His expression feels calm, withdrawn, and emotionally restrained, evoking modern editorial minimalism.

A large, powerful black horse stands very close behind him, almost shielding his presence. The horse’s head is slightly lowered toward him, ears alert yet calm, mane thick and textured, creating an intimate visual bond. The reins subtly connect the man and the horse, symbolizing trust, strength, and silent companionship.

The background is a minimal, open landscape with rough ground and no visible structures, creating a sense of isolation and timelessness. Lighting is soft natural daylight, evenly diffused, producing deep blacks, gentle mid-tones, and clean highlights. Use high-contrast monochrome grading, shallow depth of field, fine film grain, and a luxury editorial aesthetic inspired by high-fashion magazines. Shot should resemble an 85mm lens, moody, poetic, and emotionally rich, with sharp subject detail and a soft, uncluttered horizon.

prompt:

title: Photo to Sketch Split Portrait Notebook Style
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the primary and absolute reference. Preserve the exact facial identity, proportions, hairstyle, glasses, skin tone, and expression. Do not alter the face, pose, or realism.

Create a vertically split composition showing a half-realistic photograph and half hand-drawn illustration of the same subject.

Left side: ultra-realistic photographic portrait of a young man wearing round glasses and a pastel hoodie, holding a digital pen or stylus near his face. Natural skin texture, soft friendly smile, calm and approachable expression, curly textured hair exactly matching the reference.

Right side: clean black-ink hand-drawn sketch illustration of the same subject. Precise facial alignment with the photo side, thin ink outlines, smooth line art, light cross-hatching for shading, accurate hoodie folds, glasses drawn with clean minimal lines.

The split runs perfectly through the center of the face, aligning eyes, nose, lips, and glasses seamlessly between photo and sketch.

Background: off-white notebook paper texture with light blue horizontal lines. Surround the subject with playful hand-drawn doodles such as hearts, stars, smiley faces, arrows, and a paper airplane. Include casual handwritten Korean text like '안녕' and '사랑해' in black ink.

Lighting is soft and even. Maintain high clarity, sharp focus, natural contrast, and a seamless blend between realism and illustration. Mood is creative, youthful, cozy, and artistic. Ultra-high resolution, professional photo-illustration fusion.

title: Cinematic Urban Collage Portrait with Multi-Panel Background men
Cinematic Urban Collage Portrait with Multi-Panel Background women
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the ONLY and ABSOLUTE facial identity reference. The woman’s face must remain 100% accurate and unchanged — same facial structure, skin tone, hairstyle, jawline, expression, and natural details. No face swapping, no beautification, no AI smoothing, no alteration of facial identity.

Create a modern cinematic collage portrait with a premium editorial aesthetic. The main foreground subject is a high-resolution cut-out portrait of the woman placed slightly to the left side of the frame. Add a clean, smooth white outline around the subject, sticker-style, with professional edges. She wears modern casual fashion (oversized shirt, blazer, or open layer over a top), with realistic fabric texture and natural folds. Pose is relaxed yet confident, with a subtle feminine elegance, looking slightly away from the camera. Expression is calm, stylish, and introspective. Lighting is soft cinematic lighting with natural skin tones, gentle highlights, and controlled contrast. The main subject is ultra-sharp, highly detailed, and in perfect focus.

Behind the main subject, generate multiple rounded-rectangle background panels stacked vertically. Each panel contains a different cinematic portrait of the SAME woman, generated from the uploaded face and maintaining exact facial identity. These background images depict urban lifestyle and fashion moments. All background panels are slightly desaturated or black-and-white, with cinematic depth of field and soft background blur.

Background panel variations include: a modern city skyline portrait with moody clouds, an urban street fashion shot, a side-profile editorial portrait, a minimal city background with shallow focus, and a casual walking pose in an urban environment. The background uses a dark, atmospheric gradient to enhance depth and visual hierarchy.

Overall color mood is moody, modern, and premium. Background panels remain grayscale or muted, while the main subject retains natural color for strong contrast. Add subtle film grain for a cinematic editorial finish. Ultra-realistic photography, high dynamic range, professional composition, clean subject separation, no distortion, no artifacts, Instagram-ready and wallpaper-quality output.

title: Collage of images with one main image
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the ONLY and ABSOLUTE facial identity reference. The woman's face must remain 100% unchanged — identical facial structure, skin tone, eye shape, nose, lips, expression, hairline, and natural texture. No face swapping, no beautification, no AI smoothing, no stylization, and no alteration of identity.

Create an ultra-realistic, cinematic editorial portrait collage centered on a confident Indian woman wearing a traditional saree. The main subject stands gracefully in the foreground in full color, wearing a rich earthy-toned saree (warm brown, rust, or muted maroon shades) with natural fabric folds and realistic draping. Her posture is elegant and relaxed, one hand gently raised near her hair or neck, eyes softly closed or looking slightly upward, conveying calm confidence, self-love, and timeless beauty.

Surrounding the central figure is a collage of multiple black-and-white portraits of the same woman in different candid moments and angles — reading, smiling softly, looking over her shoulder, seated casually, or standing near a railing. These monochrome images act as emotional memories and personality layers, framing the central color portrait without overpowering it.

The lighting is soft, cinematic, and natural — a blend of diffused daylight and gentle highlights that enhance skin realism and fabric texture. Shadows are smooth and realistic, with no harsh contrast. The background elements feel minimal, organic, and authentic, including subtle outdoor or balcony environments, blurred urban or natural backdrops, and soft depth-of-field.

Add delicate visual accents such as subtle floral elements near the top of the composition, light film grain, and gentle tonal contrast to enhance the editorial feel. Maintain photographic realism throughout — realistic skin pores, natural hair strands, accurate fabric weave, and lifelike proportions.

Overall mood: elegant, soulful, feminine, timeless, and emotionally grounded. Style inspired by high-end Indian fashion editorials, cinematic portrait photography, and modern cultural storytelling. Aspect ratio vertical, high resolution, sharp focus, premium realism.

title: Reflection
prompt:
Use the uploaded image as the primary and absolute visual reference. Preserve 100% facial identity — same face shape, skin texture, smile, eye structure, hairline, and natural imperfections. Do not change or beautify the face.

Create a cinematic self-portrait collage featuring the same young man, composed of three vertically stacked portrait frames separated by realistic torn-paper edges. The overall mood is calm, reflective, and modern.

Top frame: A black-and-white portrait of the subject standing near a bridge or rooftop railing, head slightly lowered, eyes looking down thoughtfully. Natural overcast daylight, soft contrast, subtle film grain.

Middle frame (hero frame): A full-color portrait of the same subject turning back toward the camera with a warm, genuine smile. Outdoor grassy background, light beige traditional kurta, natural skin tones, realistic fabric texture, shallow depth of field, soft background blur. This frame is the emotional focus.

Bottom frame: A black-and-white cinematic portrait of the subject leaning casually with arms crossed, smiling while looking to the side. Balanced contrast, gentle shadows, editorial photography feel.

Editing style: minimalist, clean composition, subtle film grain, soft natural lighting, realistic torn-paper texture between frames, modern lifestyle editorial look. Optional minimal handwritten-style typography.

Camera & quality: ultra-realistic DSLR look, 50mm lens perspective, sharp facial focus, high dynamic range, natural color science, ultra-high resolution.
